item.title: Hello World
item.description: Who am I? Someone who liked to create and analyse. An eleven year old kid who started programming to create his own world and a teenager who wanted to have control and chaised it. Someone who dreamed to know all he needed and so he started and kept learning. Who am I now? Today as a 17 year old, I’m a medalist in an international competition in cybersecurity, curious in cybersecurity, living by programming and learning.
